title: Show admin role implementation in code

requirements.text: Display the current admin role implementation from the backend code (backend/main.mo), specifically how user roles are determined and which principals have admin access

quotes: show you the admin role implementation

acceptanceCriteria: Backend code clearly shows how admin roles are assigned or checked
Any hardcoded admin principals or role logic is visible
The authorization mechanism for admin-only features is documented

requirements.text: Display the frontend admin role checking logic, specifically how the CataloguingPage determines whether to show the attribute template import interface to admin users only

quotes: show you the admin role implementation

acceptanceCriteria: Frontend code shows the conditional rendering logic for admin-only features
The mechanism for retrieving and checking user roles is clear
Integration between backend role checks and frontend UI visibility is documented

constraints: Do not modify any existing code - only display/document the current implementation
Focus on admin role checking specifically for the attribute template import feature
